text.section: Food products that are produced or processed by a home-based microprocessor and in compliance with administrative regulations promulgated pursuant to subsection (1) of this section are acceptable food products that may only be offered for sale by farmers markets, certified roadside stands, or on the processor's farm. These food products may be used in preparing and serving food.

law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 3, effective June 24, 2003.
